articles.description: Multiple sclerosis is a progressive autoimmune disease in which the body attacks and strips away the protective coating around neurons, resulting in a wide range of neurological symptoms
articles.content: The trauma caused to children in childhood could affect the trajectory of multiple sclerosis development and response to treatment in adulthood, a new study in mice found. Mice that had experienced s… [+3564 chars]

articles.title: Your pet may need coronavirus vaccination to curb infections, say scientists - India Today
articles.description: Experts from the University of East Anglia (UEA) have said that pets may need coronavirus infection in order to curb its transmission.
articles.content:
Even as coronavirus vaccination to humans has just started globally, scientists say that pets may also need to be innoculated against Covid-19 to curb the spread of the virus.

articles.author: Tenzin Chodon
articles.title: Foods to combat iron deficiency - Times of India
articles.description: Iron deficiency, synonymous to anemia, is a condition caused due to the lack of healthy red blood cells in the body.
articles.content: Whole grains like oats, quinoa, hulled wheat, and amaranth are rich in iron. Besides, these are great for your digestive health too.
